metadata.title: CVE-2021-36976 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
libarchive 3.4.1 through 3.5.1 has a use-after-free in copy_string (calledfrom do_uncompress_block and process_block).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-36976` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libarchive-tools - 3.5.2-1ubuntu1
libarchive13 - 3.5.2-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5.2-1ubuntu1').
